0.text: Innate: Periodically, Nocturne's next basic attack deals 20% AD bonus physical damage to the target and 120% AD physical damage to surrounding enemies, while also  healing himself for 15 − 40 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) per enemy hit.

1.text: Umbra Blades' damage to the primary target can  critically strike for「 (192.5% +  38.5%) AD physical damage. 」「 110% of the  critical damage of his basic attacks. 」

2.text: Damage and healing are reduced by 50% against  minions.

3.text: Basic attacks reduce Umbra Blades'  cooldown by 1 second, increased to 3 seconds against  monsters and enemy  champions.

0.text: Active: Nocturne sends out a shadow blade in a line in the target direction that leaves a Dusk Trail on its path, dealing physical damage to enemies it passes through and causing enemy  champions hit to also leave a Dusk Trail behind their movement for 5 seconds.

1.text: While on the Dusk Trail, Nocturne is  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed and  bonus attack damage.

0.text: Passive: Nocturne gains  bonus attack speed.

1.text: Active: Nocturne gains a  spell shield for 1.5 seconds.

2.text: Blocking an ability doubles Shroud of Darkness' passive bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

0.text: Passive: Nocturne gains  90% bonus movement speed when moving toward  fleeing targets.

1.text: Active: Nocturne plants nightmares into the target enemy's mind, forming a  tether between Nocturne and the target for 2 seconds, during which the target takes magic damage over the duration.

2.text: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is made to  flee from Nocturne for a duration, during which they are  slowed by 90%.

0.text: Active: Nocturne inflicts unstable terror upon all enemy champions,  nearsighting them for 6 seconds. Paranoia can be recast for the same duration after 0.25 seconds.

1.text: Recast: Nocturne  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target enemy  champion, dealing them physical damage upon arrival.

2.text: If  Shroud of Darkness is active at the time of Paranoia's recast, its duration is refreshed every 0.25 seconds for the flight.

1.concerningText: Active: Nocturne sends out a shadow blade in a line in the target direction that leaves a Dusk Trail on its path, dealing physical damage to enemies it passes through and causing enemy  champions hit to also leave a Dusk Trail behind their movement for 5 seconds.
While on the Dusk Trail, Nocturne is  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed and  bonus attack damage.

2.concerningText: Passive: Nocturne gains  bonus attack speed.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

Keywords

Stats

+50 attack damage
+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BLOODLUST: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion,  heal for ( 2% /  1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% /  3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
